title: Who Was The Best Three-Point Shooter in Men’s College Basketball During The 2023-2024 Season?
text:
Basketball


Code
library(tidyverse)


── Attaching core tidyverse packages ──────────────────────── tidyverse 2.0.0 ──
✔ dplyr     1.1.4     ✔ readr     2.1.5
✔ forcats   1.0.0     ✔ stringr   1.5.1

Code
library(hoopR)

mbb_player_stats <- load_mbb_player_box(seasons = 2024)

mbb3pt <- mbb_player_stats|>
  group_by(athlete_display_name, team_short_display_name)|>
  summarize(
    total3ptmade = sum(three_point_field_goals_made),
    total3ptattempted = sum(three_point_field_goals_attempted),
    totalpts = sum(points)
  )|>
  mutate(
    player3ptpct = total3ptmade / total3ptattempted,
    pointsoff3pts = total3ptmade * 3,
    pointsnot3pts = totalpts - pointsoff3pts
  )|>
arrange(desc(total3ptmade))


`summarise()` has grouped output by 'athlete_display_name'. You can override
using the `.groups` argument.


Code
mbb3ptlong <- mbb3pt |>
  select(-totalpts) |>
  pivot_longer(
    cols = ends_with("pts"),
    names_to = "Type Of Point",
    values_to = "points"
  )

ggplot() + 
  geom_point(data = mbb3pt, aes(x = total3ptattempted
, y = total3ptmade)) +
  theme_minimal()


Warning: Removed 6831 rows containing missing values or values outside the scale range
(`geom_point()`).
